title: Support looking for active ranked 5s team :)
body:
Hello, looking for serious ranked 5s team with motivation to climb ranks and get better :)
I was mid-diamond before the reset but i'm not so much interested in soloq anymore. Much prefer to play in a team.

IGN: Tyron
Age: 18
Champs: {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:117}} 

Add me in game and we can talk :^)

replies.body: b5 supp here i spectate high plat dimond game and all da supps r abott the same as me but in dat elo the merkman kno wat mechanox r and cs, but dis elo noob cant even stai clear of blits hok or lerst hert minens, elo hell is real, u only got dia cauz of luck and no noob merksmans, plz give me ur acc so i may supp widout dat bs adc which suk dik w0wzors, gg i belong challenjour but elo heily is reyl
